description: Try our easy to follow Spinach & Ricotta Cannelloni recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Cannelloni,Soy free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Spinach,Peanut free
name: Spinach & Ricotta Cannelloni Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 sheet fresh lasagne, cut into thirds
0.75 cup parmesan, finely grated (save 1/4 cup finely grated)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Grease a 10-cup capacity lasagne dish. Place spinach in a sieve and, using your hands, squeeze out as much liquid as possible. Roughly chop and place in a bowl. Stir in ricotta and Parmesan and season.
Spoon 1/3 cup of spinach mixture along one long edge of one pasta piece. Roll up to enclose and place in prepared dish. Repeat with remaining filling and pasta.

Combine sauce and 1/2 cup water in a bowl. Spoon over pasta rolls. Combine cheeses and sprinkle over. Bake for 30 minutes or until pasta is cooked through and cheese is golden. Stand for 10 minutes. Garnish with herbs. Serve with broccoli, if liked.
